item.title: Amazon revamps Fire TV, launches its own ‘Artline’ televisions with frames at CES
item.description: Fire TV's new interface focuses on your content and offers easier, speedier navigation, Amazon says.

item.title: Amazon’s AI assistant comes to the web with Alexa.com
item.description: Amazon is bringing Alexa+ to the web with a new Alexa.com site, expanding its AI assistant beyond devices and positioning it as a family-focused, agen...

item.title: Google previews new Gemini features for TV at CES 2026
item.description: Google TV will let you ask Gemini to find and edit your photos, adjust your TV settings and more.

item.title: LG’s new OLED TV is just 9mm thick
item.description: This year LG is showing off its manufacturing chops at CES with a new Wallpaper OLED TV that is just 9mm thick.

item.title: Luminar claims founder Austin Russell is dodging a subpoena in the bankruptcy case
item.description: The Luminar founder claims he has been cooperative.
